nome: One Piece: Episode of Merry - Mou Hitori no Nakama no Monogatari

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: One Piece: Episode of Merry - Mou Hitori no Nakama no Monogatari
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: One Piece: Episode of Merry - The Tale of One More Friend
metadata_completo.sinopse:
After Brook questions the origin of the Mini Merry name, Usopp and Chopper Tony Tony recall the adventures of the Straw Hat Crew's beloved ship, friend, and crew memberâ€”the Going Merry. Usopp abandons the crew for a fight over the Going Merry while Robin Nico leaves with the government's top assassin group, CP9. In order to bring the crew back together, Monkey D. Luffy and the remaining Straw Hats follow Robin to rescue her from the claws of the World Government.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
